reviews.review: It's best not to take the game seriously, especially if you're killer which can be hard.

It's a good game but the killers tend to disconnect once all gens are done or they use lag switches making the trial you just went through useless and boring whilst filling you with discontent and rage... Yes there are some good matches but 75% of the matches im in the killer usually farm, disconnect once were winning and use lag switches. The other 25% are the good matches! 
Im asking for dedicated servers just like people did with For Honor, It's one of the things that'll make the game better other than balancing.
Also the animations are wonky with the polygons being stretched out making it look weird.
Gameplay and the mechanics are good but the community and the matches are trash
(adding more later im tired)
Wack is the name of the game

Идеальная игра, просто феномен всех современных игр, некст ген так и прет, спасибо  разработчикам за такую классную и оптимизированную игру, а так-же, вовремя устраняются баги в игре , что  может не радовать, в дальнейшем планирую купить  ДЛС, чтобы поддержать данный проект, одним словом 12/10 на кончиков пальцев!!!
Love this game. Love to play it with friends for hours at a time

This is a great game when played right. The problem is that so many people out there that troll, use expoits and camp hooks that the fun can easilly be killed. Players with lots of experience on either the killer or survivor side can end up going against new players and there are so many toxic people in the games that it could lead to new players just refunding the game. People are rewarded for playing dirty and camping the hook as killer or teaming up to basicaly criple the killer.

Unless you can work though this stuff and get lucky in your matches that you dont get the toxic players or if you have a group of friends that you can play with I would not recommend this game.

If they work on fixing these problems and have things in place to limit a killers and survivors ability to play dirty and be toxic as well as fix killers that are far beyond OP (Freddy once again after they adjusted it before and got a backlash of hate for it) then maybe this game will be a better buy. As for me I will play on rare occations with a friend or group of friends because at least that way I might be able to have some fun with it.

Edit: Also an additional thing is that the matchmaking on this game is broken. People who are high rank can get matched up to casual low ranked players/new players if they are in a Survive With Friends group that has other low ranked people. For example one rank 6 and 3 rank 15-18 will get put up against a rank 17 killer. The rank 6 player who plays this game all the time can run circles around the killer and waste their time, saving their friends and such so the killer will be lucky to get one kill. 

This is especially true if the person playing killer happens to be trapper because their traps quickly get rendered useless by the far more experienced player that runs around and disables them. Then perks that help the killer for when the survivors get to the endgame phase (All generators fixed) are rendered useless because this far more experienced player also has played long enough to use a key to open up another way out that the killer may not even know the location of so them and all their friends can just jump out without having to try the gates.

Finally the killer is even more burdened by the fact that there are so many people that Disconnect from the game if it is not going their way to take away points from the killer by preventing him from getting his hook points. They "fixed" this a bit by giving some disconnection points but they are no where near what you would get for a hook. To add insult to injury the reports don't seem to do anything to punish these people and all they have to do is wait 5 seconds to be able to find a new game.

Final Thoughts:

Unless you are playing with friends or don't mind the above issues then don't buy this game until they fix it..which considering how long they have been going on for...don't expect them to ever be fixed.

Update:

Two years later the killer camping has only gotten worse. If you get anywhere in rank you will get put up constantly against killers that either just stand at the hook and stare at you or they will stand just outside the heartbeat range and stare at you. Killers that play have little to no skill which is why they use this tactic. It is cowardly and only geared to people that enjoy trolling or griefing others. If you play survivor you are going in to just get killed and only survive if you are extremely lucky.

Additions made to this game such as the timer if the exit door opens or trap door gets closed by the killer make surviving even harder though does help prevent people from needlessly dragging games on. The problem is if the killer closes the trap door which powers the gates you are now on a time limit to both open the gates and exit. Killers can patrol between them quite quickly which is only made worse when the gates spawn near each other. This makes it even harder to survive in these situations as the killers dont even have to down you...just need to keep you from opening the gates.

The biggest problem as I spoke of earlier is the camping. Killers camping hooks just make the end for survivors a matter of time as it takes too long to complete the generators. Unless you can get everyone else working on generators you wont be able to finish enough of them to power the gates and that is even a bit of a stretch as even with bonuses and people working on it you may get one and a half (two if your lucky with placement) finished before the first person dies. Then you will just end up losing people and it taking even longer to finish a generator. You will end up with one or two left by the end to be completed and the killer can patrol them very easily to keep you from having any chance of escaping.

The ranking system is also still quite broken with high rankers and low rankers getting paired up all the time. In addition even if you lose a game you still continue to rank up. I went from fresh rank 14 to late rank 12 and I won...two games out of 15ish? HOW does that even work!? It is impossible for you to ever play with people your own skill level after playing for a bit and no matter how much you report the bad players the developers wont do a damn thing about it.

Final thoughts:

You want to play as the killer and just be a prick to people then get this game. You want a challenge while still having a chance to escape as a survivor, dont get this game. It is solely geared for the killers with no care about survivors no matter what the devs say. They even say they put killers out initially as too powerful and then "balance them" later. Get this if you and 4 other friend just want to play together and have fun.
10/10 Would loop again.
Ich finde dieses Spiel sehr gut. Macht Spaß, und sorgt neben dem ganzen psychischen Terror für ordentlichen Nervenkitzel

Dead by Daylight is a great 4V1 game that is both challenging and strategic. It acts as a cat and mouse game on both the suvivours and killers sides with you trying to outwit and predict what the other will do. It's not without it's flaws like all prominantly online games but it's definately one that is worth playing.

PRO
- Games are pretty quick to find due to a good number of people playing
- Each game is different with opponents, teammates and the randomly generated maps.
- Every suvivour and killer has their own unique perks and abilities.
- Plenty of killers and survivours to choose from and well timed and decently priced DLC (which include new maps)
- Graphics are pretty nice and it runs well.
- Lots of crossovers into different horror franchises that works great such as Michael Myers from Halloween, the Pig from Saw, Freddy Keruger from Nightmare on Elm Street.
- Each game lasts roughly between 5 to 20 minutes depending on how well the players are doing which is a good length so it's not over too fast or you're getting bored.
- Ranking system and levelling gives the grind a good feel. As you level up and spend points on the bloodweb you gain new perks, abilities and items that you can use in the games.
- The music and atmospheric sounds really add to the tense aura of the game and that's not even mentioning the heartbeat that plays when the killers are near.
- Events are held every so often which give special bonus' for in game events which are fun to go for.
- There is no forcing players to work together which is great if you prefer to play solo. It actualyl tells you that you can do either and it will have pros and cons, it's about whichever works best for you.
- Survivours play in third person to give an advantage of a heightened sense of "awareness" while the killers play in first person which is a great design choice.

CON
- No single player tutorial, it's all just text. It's alright but there's a lot to cover.
- Players can sometimes be obnixious and quit before you're able to kill them. You get points but I don't think it's as much as it would be if you killed them nor is there much in the way of a punishment for that.
- At first there were special DLC outfits that you could buy for cheap but it seems that they have implemented an "in game currency" for that which you can only use real money to get (that I know of). It wouldn't be as bad but there is a very limited selection as of now eg, plenty for survivours, not as much for killers.
- Some players do enjoy running around the same thing over and over again so be prepared for a little frustration when vying to kill them.

Dead by Daylight is a great game if you can get past the 1 in 10 games that's pretty bad due to some annoying or frustrating players. But from my experience most of the games ar ereally fun and tense with everyone taking part and playing their role. If you enjoy a game of strategic teamwork or a game of brutal, bloody murder then give it a try.
Fun Game, The game has some bugs in it but it is so damn addictive, very fun for people who like horror games, and cat mouse games

Pretty addictive doe.

Recomendo para todos!

Devo ammettere che all'inizio questo titolo non mi aveva molto ispirato; lo ritenevo troppo ripetitivo per poter essere apprezzato a sufficienza da giocarci per ore e ore. Devo anche ammettere di averlo trovato in sconto a poco meno di 10 euro. Secondo me, per quel prezzo, vale assolutamente la pena di comprarlo.
Alla fine si è rivelato un gioco molto meno ripetitivo del previsto e che continua ad attirarmi in game come alla prima partita, anzi! Più ci gioco, più scopro dettagli che mi ero perso (modi di giocare, strategie o trucchetti). E fin'ora ho giocato persino solo come sopravvisuto, giusto qualche partita come killer. Consigliato!

このゲームの雰囲気や景観など、褒める場所も多くあるが、それをすべてなしにしてしまうのがバランス調整とプレイヤーの質である。
また、今からこのゲームを始めたいと思っているプレイヤーに対して冷遇で、少し前にチュートリアルが追加されただけで、パークやランクシステムなど初心者に対して最初から厳しい環境を強いることが殆ど。
そのせいもあってかプレイヤーの質も低く、煽りや切断などの迷惑行為がほぼ毎試合起こる。
この環境が変わらないか、一緒にプレイするフレンドがいない限り、あまりこのゲームをおすすめすることはできない。

New Review time. I have been a devoted player for well over 4 years, streamed it for the missus, have been following since before the release, participated in the mobile beta and various PTBs etc. So I'll give as honest review as I can. And it should be noted that I play a fair amount of both sides.

First off, the good has mostly stayed the same to my previous review. I've nominated this game for the "Labor of Love" award in the upcoming 2020 Steam Awards. I did the same last year and I know many mind find that abhorrent. 

[list]Pros:
[*]Fun game-play, it will seem daunting at first but once you get a hang of the mechanics and know what to do, you'll get there. There's nothing quite like the feeling of fear when facing a killer, which is what you'll get if its your first time playing. After 4 years? Not so much. But it's still a hell of a thrill. Adrenaline pumping and we're still getting new killers added.

[*]Ranking system is decent. There's been a new one since last years with a hidden MMR system kind of like League of Legends. It's worked well for me so far. The "Bloodpoints" and how they're earned are much more easier than back in the day and now with the archives, there's plenty of ways to level up the characters.

[*]Surviving with friends is fun, alas, I don't play it as often as I play by myself. Oh hey, we have crossplay with literally everyone? PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Switch, Stadia, MS Store? That's an impressive feat and a much appreciated one! I tip my hat to the devs.

[*]There's a vast choice of characters to choose from, which in itself can be a little daunting. Killers are always unique for the most part, which is nice to see. On top of that, there's an even larger variety of perks to customize your character into pretty much ANY play style you can think of, there are of course, meta perks as per usual. Meta perks haven't really changed all that much, which is a small gripe.

[*]We're now getting consistent patches with always detailed descriptions of what has changed, the communication between devs and players (despite what some may think) is great, especially for a big community such as this. This has improved since my last review last year. Also shoutout to the DBD Twitter Guy. You da best.

[*]Lore: The lore in this game is pretty damn solid, making me hungry for more. Back when it first released in '16, there was a small back story for each and that was about it. (The game was projected to only sell about 800,000 units after all) But as it is now, they've expanded massively, especially with the archives where we can learn about the killers back before they willingly (or unwillingly) joined The Entity. (On a side note, the "battle pass" system in place is completely fine)

[*]Music: Michel F April does a fantastic job with all the tracks in the game. They give you a good sense of terror but also give you that pump of adrenaline and it works fantastic. Hell, sometimes I'll get chased for the music. I hope we get an update soon.

[*]Licensed Killers: This one is a bit of a middle ground for me, since don't get me wrong, its great to see. Myers is great, Freddy is great, Demogorgon is great (with awesome sound design), Leatherface, is okay at best but not as viable as the rest. Pig makes cute squeaks when pallet stunned, 'nuff said. And finally, GhostFace. Now I like what they did for this, since they went for the license to the mask, rather than the film, giving them more ideas to go with and able to make his own unique story (even same name as me)
[/list]

[list]Cons:
[*]Buggy. Yes this is probably a big one for some. T-pose Myers? Floating head Myers with a Chainsaw? There's been some hilarious and some not so much. Dedicated Servers are a blessing, though we suffered through some major hiccups to get where we are and they still aren't perfect. (For example, Huntress hatches registering as 2 hits, causing an insta-down)

[*]Whilst I gave a pro point for the variety of characters, there are A LOT to purchase, especially for those looking to buy the game for the first time. On top of that, there are cosmetics as well, which would mean more money (but is optional of course).

[*]The community. Don't get me wrong, you do get some good eggs but good god, there are some major bad eggs. Hook camping, sandbagging, tunneller are terms you will 100% come across as you play the game, even if you played as fair as you can possibly play. Don't be like this, don't get into that mentality. It ends up scaring off many players. The game-play can't even be enjoyed when killers and survivors alike have a go at you post game for making one wrong move, which will happen. We're only human after all. Disconnecting is common practice in the lower ranks. Both ends of the game faces challenges and toxicity.
[/list]

It's a fun game but becomes a more challenging as you progress in to the higher red ranks, especially as a killer. It'll often stress you out. The devs, despite it all are still trying make things the best they can be. I tip my hat to those in the art team, cause it is gorgeous. They could have let this game die and leave it how it was back in '16. Trust me, you wouldn't want that (have a check on Youtube).

I do recommend it definitely. [b] My only advice is that with this particular game, take breaks. [/b] [i] They will be needed. [/i]

Not much has changed from my original review from a year ago. Bugs are being worked on, graphical updates to all the older maps are absolutely stunning. 

I could go on and on. Yes there are times where I don't play this game for a while but I always find myself coming back to it.

Dead By Daylight has lived for 4 years and I can guarantee it'll be around for another 4 years, if not more. 

[b] See you in the Fog! [/b]

殺人鬼１人ｖｓサバイバー４人の非対称対戦ゲーム

透明化、ワープ、高速突進、罠師、投擲斧、範囲電撃など
個性豊かな能力を持ったオリジナルキラーたちに加えて
『エルム街の悪夢』からフレディ、『レザーフェイス』からカニバル、『SAW』からアマンダ、『ハロウィン』からマイケルといったホラー界の大御所たちが参戦。
もちろんキラーと同数のサバイバーも用意されおり、数々のパークを組み合わせる事で多くの戦い方を楽しむ事ができる。
ルールはシンプル。サバイバーがフィールド上に点在する発電機を５台修理し、ゲートを開けて脱出するというもの。
しかしキラーがそれを黙ってみているはずもなく、上で紹介した数々の能力を駆使しそれを妨害してくる。もちろん４人全員脱出できるとは限らず、救助といった概念もあり、助けるか見捨てて逃げるかは各々の判断に委ねられる。

と、宣伝感丸出しで説明はしたものの、素直におすすめはできない。
ゲームとしてはすごくおもしろい。非対称対戦はまだまだ少なく、やはり新鮮なのもある。問題なのはプレイヤーだ。
ランクシステムがほぼ機能しておらず、熟練者による低ランク狩りが横行している。
特にキラーとしてプレイするなら、かなりの頻度で煽り行為を受ける覚悟が必要。
また、開発によるバランス調整が充分とは言い難く、それが上２つの状態と相まって、キラー初心者のうちはろくに妨害する間もなく次々修理される発電機、浴びせられる閃光玉もビックリの懐中電灯、屈強な肉壁によって守られる負傷者、恐れられるべき殺人鬼に何故かまとわりついてくるド派手な服を着た連中とハゲ。そして定期的に行われる高速屈伸運動。
これらにより、むしろ最低ランクこそが最大の修羅場と化している。

こんなことは言いたくないが、もしキラーでプレイするなら、全く同時に４人または３人プレイヤーが入ってきた時は部屋を解体する事を強く推奨する。高確率でパーティを組んでおり、なおかつこのゲームではチートクラスの利便性を持つVCを使っている場合がある。そしてなによりとてつもなくマナーが悪いケースが多い。本当に多い。解体は厳選といって嫌うプレイヤーも一部いるが、こと初心者においては正当な自衛手段であると断言する。
またライトを持ったサバイバーがいたとき、ライトをあてるためにはキラーの前方にスペースが必要なので、倒したサバイバーを担ぎ上げる時は壁や岩などを向いて行うことを推奨する。固定モーションにより無抵抗でライトを浴びせられる。もしくは素直に部屋を解体してしまってもいい。
それと派手な服を着た方々は追いかけっこに自信がある人が多い。一度の追いかけっこが長引けば長引くほど負けが近づくため、無視してしまうのも手。煽ってくる者も同じ。
なにせ煽られる。そこそこ有名な対人ゲームの中でも、突出して高頻度で煽られる。ただそこからある程度ランクを上げていくと、それも心なしか少なくなってくるし、その頃には色々と自分で判断できるようになっていると思う。あとは自由に。
もしくはサバイバー側をやっておくのもいい。キラーはとにかく忙しく、煽ってる時間すら惜しいためサバイバーで煽られる事は比較的少ない。ないわけではないが。
还不错，现在的环境适合新手玩人类

разрабы пидорасы которые не хотят фиксить баги. все что они делают так это голандский штурвал по часовой а потом против часовой стрелки. дай им бог здоровья. 
Но спустя столько времени разработчики проделали действительно большую работу, что не могло не сказаться на производительности игры - у меня она стала вылетать еще чаще. Очень рекомендую ее неуравновешенным людям которые мечтают о нервном срыве и обожают закрывать зависшие приложения при помощи диспетчера задач. Разработчики так и остались гомофлексящими хуесосами-глиномесами, которые вместо фикса багов вводят новые "революционные фичи" типа новых скинов на персонажей. Долгих лет жизни им, чтобы могли и дальше радовать нас стальным продуктом (единственным блять).

This game is great. It's not complicated and a lot of fun, asspecially when you are with friends.
However, while the devs are doing great there are a couple of flaws to it.

There is a perk called BBQ & Chilli, used by Killers. This perk lets you see where other players are on the map for a couple seconds after the Killer hooked a survivor. This is a kind of wallhack, and like every other game; this is awfull and unfair and keeps the fun of the match away. This is a stealth game and this ( Like the doctor* ) is just annoying. ( *The doctor can make people go insane so he knows where you are most of time. ) Imagine those combined.

This is the biggest flaw, and besides that is just one little thing that bugs me and my friend are campers. Once a Killer hooked someone, the camp near the hooked person and stay until they die. This is no fun and just annoys everyone.

( This could be fix by blinding the Killer if he stays too long around the same place, or just a hooked person. And/ or triggering a Trigger-alert for other survivors. )
很刺激的一款游戏，适合和朋友玩，只是对新手不好

The game is not fun unless you survive with friends(full squad). Their report system is very incomplete so you will run into a lot of hackers and very toxic players that consistently use hate speech and racial slurs at you. Also latley I feel they have constantly nerfed the survivors side of things and it is very easy as a killer once you are able to have all 4 perks you want in a build to get a 4 kill match. Also you get more bloodpoints as a killer than you do as a survivor so if you like being a survivor main but, are trying to level up/prestiege. You are going to have to play killer to get any bloodpoints. 80% of your dailys will also be killer dailys. Also Killers usually dodge a group of 4 anyways so it almost always takes forever to find a macth. So it could be a great game. I'd save your money and wait for it to be on sale for 50% off.

Dead by Daylight - это когда:
- поиск с друзьями идет годами
- ты мечтал попадать в команду с сурвами, у которых 1-20 часов в игре.
- твою маму любит все комьюнити
- фейскемпят за шестеренку, за фонарь, юзание досок и окон, за часы, да и за все-все-все. 
- отбегал 5 генеров и лёг на ноеде
- два прыжка в одно окно называют "абузом"
- когда пилят крюки, всегда говорят, что у них дейлик
- маньяки думают, что осколок имба
- в чате узнаешь много новых слов
- вторые ворота всегда закрыты
- ты стоишь у люка с маньяком полчаса
- разрабы называют "кемпинг" "патрулём" :DDDD
- в обучающем видео за киллера, учат "патрулировать" на траптере
- искал катку минут 20 и маньяк ливнул, прочекав твой профиль
- ливают из игры во время катки
- получил хит, находясь в метре от окна
- не успел закрыть сундук, и тебя распилили
- оттащили за зад, когда ты уже был на другой стороне доски
- маньяк не разбивает доски и плачет на "карусель"
- тебя тепешит всю катку,когда у маньяка большой пинг, а он фейсит тебя за это и обвиняет потом в чате 
- все "топ" пилы и медсестры играют от лежачих, кемперя на земле с нюрс коллингом и дир сталкером. 
- ведьма ставит 10 ловушек вокруг крюка и ходит в метре
- маньяк убьет всех, а одного сурва выпустит в люк
- все бегут в подвал чтобы чекнуть сундук!!!!!!!
- ты сделал минус четыре, без кемпинга и лежачих, и тебе напишут, что ты кемпер
- эксклюзивные скины есть почти у всех
- убер-престиж может получить любая 20-ка, а также бесконечные топовые вещи, перки и подношения, прописав себе "сейв", который можно легко найти в инете 
- ты играешь за сурва, а тебя путают с маньяком челики с фонарём
- фул престижный Хилл Билл никогда не заводит в катке пилу
- в чате нужно всем промыть рот с мылом
- каждый маньяк и сурв придумывает свои правила игры, под которые должны подстроиться все
- маньяк застрял в паллете 
- маньяк предложит пофармить, а потом убьет тебя
- отпустил в люк сурва, а он написал тебе "изи"
- сурвы страшней маньяка
- при побеге из подвала, тебе всегда заблочат окно здоровые сурвы
- подвальная паллета кидается просто так!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
- через 2 минуты после начала катки все доски лежат
- сурв ставит в фонарь две катушки
- маньяк который фейсил за шестеренку, играя за сурва берет шестеренку 
- пилят крюки, когда открыты ворота, и очков за них уже не дают
- первая катка в день начинается с мементо
- маньяк берет хватку и агитацию
- на майерсе берут перки ноед, порча: пожирание надежды, аддон на бесконечную третюю стадию и эбенновое мементо за одну катку
- пила на ноеде "тащит"
- катка не начинается в полном составе, либо кто-то ливает, либо кого-то вылетает
- подставной сурв в стаке с маньком бодиблочит тебя всю игру, а потом фармит со своим другом, когда все отъехали
- кемпер играя на сурве, кидает репорт другому кемперу за кемперство 
- от фейскемпинга нельзя снять
- половина перков просто бесполезны и неюзабельны
- маньяк повесит тебя в подвал и будет чекать все шкафчики, пока ты умираешь, а потом будет п*здеть, что видел следы
- сурвы всю катку ломают пустые тотемы
- если ты сломал заряженный тотем тебя зафейсят
- маньяк будет стоять за крюком в инсидиусе
- тебя будут мементить две минуты, пока ты не истечешь кровью
- если ты Джейк, то за крюки в любом случае умрешь ты, даже если их не пилил
- играют одни "профессионалы", которые ждут люк, пока ты отъезжаешь на крюке.
- разработчики на стриме, говорят "все будет!" и смотрят картинки

Dbd has a lot of strengths going for it. I'm going to cover both the strengths and weakness of the game in its current state. The game is unique in its killers, map design, perks, and addons. It offers players a very large learning curve, that is both interesting and compelling. There is a lot of flavor text and lore. The store is an amazing thing for DBD, and theres always fresh content coming. 

       As I’ve said before the killers have a ton of different unique powers. These alongside their addons really contribute to making no game the same. Every game you join in will have a different map and a different level design since there’s parts that are randomly generated, from the walls, to generator spawns, totems, you get the point. this supports my next point about how there is a big learning curve in this game. To truly master this game its imperative that you play both killer and survivor. Each will teach you the gameplay mechanics of this game. You’ll learn about perks, items, and even survivor or killer habits. It’s important to learn totem spawns for example, that way you can find out where those hex perks are hidden. Overall the game will just keep you coming back to learn more and more about the game. 

       Now lets talk lore. There is a ton of it. Each survivor and killer has a unique backstory. Even the maps have lore, you can find a ton of it on the Dbd website, or visit the devs stream to ask them direct questions about it. There is so much to learn about and if you haven’t noticed there is a ton of flavor text on addons, offerings, and perks. 
        
       As I said before the store is an amazing thing because it offers you the ability to unlock tons of things for free. Yes you heard me right. While you can’t unlock everything for free, there is still quite a selection on what you can acquire. Even for some of the characters that you can’t unlock without paying for, you can still acquire their perks via shrine of secrets. I have acquired numerous perks without even owning a character thanks to this.  As of right now too, expansions for the game just keep coming out. I can’t remember the road map they set out, but there is always going to be new content to keep the game fresh. Overall the game has a lot of diverse content, ranging to different maps, to different playstyles, cosmetics, perks, addons, and there’s always new content coming. For what the game does best, it really shows.

       Now let’s cover some of the issue that I have with the game. Firstly, there is defiantly balancing issues.. Then we have hitboxes, which can pretty wack sometimes. One other thing I have noticed is that there is a lack of incentive to play at higher levels. And finaly we are going to touch on loading screens and dedicated servers.

       So Balancing, lets just start by saying that some of the killers are their builds are pretty busted. Personally I am all for counter play on both survivor and killer. But, there are some builds which you literally just can’t play around. More in specific, if you face off against a good nurse. There’s no way you’re gonna win. You really can’t outplay a killer who can blink over obstacles, and can travel the whole map in literal seconds with the right build. Billy for example is someone who can easily one shot and travel the map. And don’t get my started on his hitbox. In terms of build, right now at least, Franks Mixtap, Instadown hatchets, these just feel so strong that it is super hard to play against. 
Now Lets talk Hitboxes. Hitboxes at least for me can sometimes be realllly bad. There’s nothing worse then slamming down a pallet on a killer, and having them hit you as though the pallet didn’t do anything. Huntresses hatchets, which honestly have the worst hitboxes in the game can be gamble. Sometimes they hit, or sometimes they miss. Its just 50/50 and whichever end of the stick you’re on, well best of luck.

       This can also be applied to the servers with DBD at the moment, which has you connect to the killers lobby. So the killer essentially has priority of the connection. Dedicated servers are coming, might happen in the next patch or so. But what this means, is that you can run into cheaters who essentially lag switch, which pretty much means they walk up to you and kill you. And ur stuck in place. At lower ranks you’re not really gonna run into this, but when I was around rank 5, I ran into this so often. This brings me to my next point which is loading screens. Yes, what could be so bad about a loading screen. Well when youre game constantly freezes, and doesn’t let you or a teammate into the game. I play this game primarly on Pc, so I’m not sure how it affects consoles, but this is a problem that I run into ever 4-10 games. Once or twice really isn’t a big deal if it happens, But when it happens all the time, and not just to you, that’s when theres a bit of a problem. 
Finally for my last point we have lack of incentive. What do I mean by this? Well, every season you can rank up. It’s a lot of effort, for no reward. Reaching rank 1 only gets you two things. One, an achievement. And two, Bragging rights. I feel like if they offered any season reward whatso ever, it would honestly motivate people to play for rank much more. Imagine if they had a cosmetic, that upon unlocking at the end of the season, had a different color based off the rank you got. It doesn’t have to be much, but I feel it would add a much-needed breath for veteran players of the game. And lastly devotion needs to be fixed up a little bit. Again you get no extra rewards upon reaching the cap, other than a number to brag about.

	Finally, I give dead by daylight a score of 4/5. If you are contemplating  on whether or not to get the game, I would highly recommend that you do.  The fact that there’s always new content, brings the game more experiences and fun. The bugs, while some can be really funny, does take away from the game experience especially when you can’t even load into a game. And really the only other thing that I think is missing from this game is progression based awards whether it be in rank, or devotion, that reward you for playing more. This is more of a thing for veteran players then newer. But To end with a positive, I think that the uniqueness of a survival based horror being a multiplayer game, is really just astounding. It has so much going for it, especially with the amount of fun and unique builds that you can play. If you've stuck around this long I made an indepth video on my thoughts and opinions of the game, which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o6COPxV8rx4&t=1s
this game is the best, I enjoy it alot!
